review: I'm happily surprised by this product. I usually stream on a ps3 but my girlfriend wanted something for our 20" tv in the kitchen.There is a short introduction video when you first plug it in. One thing that is really nice is that Amazon pre-programs the Fire Stick with your Amazon info so you can start streaming on Amazon Prime without going through a set-up. I also use this for Netflix.The device is always on so you never wait for it to initiate. It's very small so I doubt you are losing very much on energy costs. (Probably a few cents)I will admit, our tv is not very hi-definition. It is a flat panel but I'd be surprised if it even runs at 720p (we got it from a friend). That said, the Fire Stick provides a good quality stream for what we use it for. I may test it on my better tvs if I decide I need additional streaming devices.The price is very nice. I just picked it up on promo for $34. Not bad in my opinion.I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive streaming device. It doesn't have any special features like audio commands but you can buy the additional remote with a headphone jack for uninterrupted listening.
